## JSONObject.createCounter() method

Don't use createCounter directly. Be sure to use it through a proxy. The reason for setting the CounterProxy type as the return value is to provide the CounterProxy interface to the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createCounter(key: string, value: CounterType): CounterProxy;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string |  |
|  value | CounterType |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

CounterProxy
